title: TheTower
briefDescription: In addition to the two camps, the map is made up of 3 very interesting towers located right in the middle, between the bases. On the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
In addition to the two camps, the map is made up of 3 very interesting towers located right in the middle, between the bases. On the central tower is at its top a beacon to bring back and put at home while, on the opposite towers spawn iron ingots and lapis lazuli: practical for your armor and your enchantments! The endless battle for control of the ?mid? can begin
Presentation: The Towers is a map created by DragonNoirFRYtB whose concept is quite simple: your objective will be to enter the opposing camp and score points by breaking the glass block and throwing yourself into a kind of pool located in the heart of the enemy base. The first team to score 3 points wins the game!
You can use crafts.
You can place and destroy as many blocks as you want.
You can loot enemy chests, but not destroy them.
You will find minecarts at TNT, you are prohibited from destroying opposing chests with them.
Our little tips:
According to the author, the map is made for teams of 3 to 5 players.
Iron armor will be very useful for offense as well as defense: think about it!
For the attack:
Quick attacks on their own as bait can occupy a few opponents while other teammates pass.
Kamikaze attacks will only be effective if you take something away from the opposing team: eat their apples, drink their potions, loot their chests ?
Only take the important stuff when you think it is necessary! You only have one chance with it.
If you feel like you?re going to die, throw yourself into the void rather than giving your opponent free stuff.
For the defense:
Protect your pool by surrounding it with blocks, by solidifying its roof ? Make it difficult to access by laying slabs underneath, by removing the stairs that lead to it ?
If you get to the middle first, try to protect the latter as much as possible with blocks (preferably wood), to delay the opposing team.
In order to prevent theft in your safe room as much as possible, break the glass and completely isolate the room with blocks: only one entry / exit!

title: Murder Mystery
briefDescription: There is a murderer on the loose and its up to you to find out who it is and bring them to justice! You can ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
There is a murderer on the loose and its up to you to find out who it is and bring them to justice! You can be a detective and solve the mystery of the murderer. Or you can play as an innocent and run from the murderer. You can play with up to 8 people to find out who it is!
You are placed in a building and one person is a murderer, another is a detective, and the rest are the innocents.
The murderer has 10 minutes to kill everyone. The murderer is given only a sword.
The detective?s goal is to find and kill the murderer. The detective is given 2 golden apples and an infinity bow.
The others are innocents must survive the murderer. They are give 2 golden apples. They can become the new detective when the old one is killed.
There are 9 differently themed rooms throughout the building to explore. You can look around and find many ways to sneak around and hide.
If you can hunt down the murderer then the innocents and the detective win! Also, if the murderer doesn?t eliminate everyone in the 10 minutes, then the innocents win as well. However, if the murderer kills everyone, then the murderer wins.
Some of the hiding spots include: an underground tunnel that transports you to different rooms, there is a room where you can hide behind a bunch of doors, one has tons of bamboo to hide in.

Gold can spawn randomly throughout the map. When you collect enough gold, you can purchase items that will help you against the opponent.
For 10 Gold you can purchase a shield
For 15 Gold you can purchase a speed potion
For 25 Gold you can purchase a healing II potion
The murderer and detective are chosen at random. And the game is continuous, so everyone will have a chance to become the person in each position.
Players: 3-8
Subscribe to Swaggy Cat: https://www.youtube.com/swaggycat
More Images:

title: TNT Spleef
briefDescription: This is a classic spleef map that has up to three layers and 5 different power ups for you too choose from. You can configure the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a classic spleef map that has up to three layers and 5 different power ups for you too choose from. You can configure the settings for it too be day/ night, the amount of layers (1,2 or 3) and whether tile drops are on or off. You can play with your friends or practise on your own in the lobby with a mini spleef and jumps on varing distance.
I?ve spend a lot of time decorating the arena so it looks nice. The five different power ups are knock back sword, speed, flame bow, invisibility or ender pearls. I hope you download and enjoy this map!

title: DodgeBow (MCC REMAKE OF DODGEBOLT)
briefDescription: Dodgebow, A Recreation of an already existing mini game called "Dodge Bolt" where only Youtubers could compete, I remade this game for those who weren't ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Dodgebow, A Recreation of an already existing mini game called ?Dodge Bolt? where only Youtubers could compete, I remade this game for those who weren?t Youtubers and could enjoy ?Dodgebolt? with their friends. The goal is simple; to eliminate the other team using weapons and blocks that will be given to you to help defeat the other opponent. Arrows can penetrate walls, Bows with the strongest accuracy. Bring home the victory in a battle for glory!
This game REQUIRES 2+ players and the max is 8 players, if there are any bugs please report them in the comments. This isnt as good as MCC, but its the closest I can get to.
Not only have I recreated this from MCC, but added custom ?game modes? which can differ the game play and add a new whole category of fun! The current ?gamemodes? are build mode, infinite arrows, Swap mode(coming soon) and magic rod!
How to play:
When you spawn into the world, you need 2-8 players to actually start the game. If this is your first time logging into the world, you must re-select the maps and game modes. After everyone is ready, step onto the red square to start the game,

Once the Square turns green, the game will start in 3 seconds.
When you first get onto the map, you will receive a bow with no arrows. That is because each team will get 1 arrow, summoned at the black rectangle. Shoot wisely!

If your team mate dies, your team will receive an arrow at the rectangle.
If an arrow hits the wall, it will get teleported to the middle.
If an arrow falls into lava, it will get teleported to the middle.
Once everyone is eliminated on the opposing team, it will announce your team as the winner and teleport everyone back to spawn!
(ps its gonna lag a little since its resetting everything)
Build Mode ? Build the fort you desire and take advantage of it against your opponent!
Infinite Arrows ? Never run out of arrows again!
Swap Mode (coming soon) ? Swap with a random on the opponent team
Magic Rod (can only be used in Fish Burnout) ? Suck your opponents into lava using a rod!
P.S: I am going to add more maps and more game modes!
Currently there are 2 maps built, the official MCC map and a custom one so you dont get bored of playing the same map!
Classic ?
Fish Burnout ?

briefDescription: A simple map that times you as you practice parkour. It's all about getting used to the course and getting the best time you possibly ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A simple map that times you as you practice parkour. It?s all about getting used to the course and getting the best time you possibly can whilst improving your parkour skills!
The course is short yet difficult, from slime jumps to trapdoors to strafing, it?s jam-packed with all sorts of parkour styles for you to both time and perfect your run on! I tried my hardest to fit in all sorts of themes and styles, with the only real one not showing up being ladder jumps (though I might include them in a sequel or future update teehee)

title: Burn The Enderman V1
briefDescription: Its a blast from the past! Burning maps have been widely popular on the java edition and many have started to die out on Bedrock. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Its a blast from the past! Burning maps have been widely popular on the java edition and many have started to die out on Bedrock. Enjoy an old game that has been refurbished with new game mechanics.
Youtubers like Popularmmos used to play these maps back in 2017 or so. This map may bring you complete nostalgia to those who remember the old days of burning maps.
What is a burning map?
A burning map is a mini-game that takes place in a large burnable structure, where lava will pour down upon it. Play with your friends and see who can survive the longest.
How To Play:
A burning map is a free-for all mini-game that you can play with your friends. First, you select a class you would like to play as, and the game is ready to be played.
Once you have selected your class, you can start the game and everyone will teleport into the structure, where lava will begin to pour onto it.
The objective is to survive the longest and be the last one surviving.
Inside the structure will be hidden loot and areas to hide in.
The map can also rest, so you can play as many rounds as you like! (However the more resets, the more lag)
Are there any rules?
Not exactly! You may make up your own rules to the game!
There are a few rules however:
Some rules are default enabled like PvP off and things like that. You are free to enable whatever game-rules you?d like!
